https://tmrev.io/movie/378107-Another Day of Life 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eK2VU8VJokGOv1K698eDKRHuzgw.jpg In 1975, Ryszard Kapuściński, a veteran Polish journalist, embarked on a seemingly suicidal road trip into the heart of the Angola's civil war. There, he witnessed once again the dirty reality of war and discovered a sense of helplessness previously unknown to him. Angola changed him forever: it was a reporter who left Poland, but it was a writer who returned… Another Day of Life
